args: Cut, cut, cut! That was TERRIBAD, guys.
*pant* *pant* I think I'm gonna keel over...
You wanna know why? 'Cause the stage\nisn't just a place of dreams and wonder.\nIt's a battlefield, too!
If you put on a shoddy show, you'll be in\nfor a world of hurt. Ever been booed off\na stage with a flurry of garbage? Not fun.
We certainly wouldn't want that.\nThe road to stardom is arduous indeed.
That's right! So if you wanna make this gig\na success, you need to go HARD in these\nlessons. I wanna see back sweat, boys!
This is ridiculous. YOU are ridiculous.\nI'm leaving.
And there he goes... Oh well.\nGuess that's a wrap for today.
I'd say so. I'm exhausted.\nOutdoor stuff is so not my forte.
It wouldn't do to push ourselves.\nShall we disperse and rest?
Everyone's falling apart... Is our boy band\ndoomed to fail before their first show?
We need a way out of this mess.
Oh, Leonidas. So this is where you went.
The sunset sure is stunning, isn't it?
Indeed. The way it dyes everything in its\nscarlet hues is remarkable. There is no\nbetter time of day to behold the sea.
Hey, Leonidas? Would you consider\ngiving our boy band a second chance?
The way things are now, we're on\na fast track to early retirement.
I do not understand.\nWhat do you hope to accomplish with this?
I know you engage in this kind of frivolous\nnonsense in between battles from time to\ntime. But what is the point of it?
I understand how it looks. But no matter\nhow frivolous it may seem, it's important\nfor me to give everything I do my all.
I believe that in doing so, I can strengthen\nthe bonds I've made with others—and\nmaybe even form new bonds as well.
Do you think that's nonsense too?
I'm sure that I would have in the past.
Now I know all too well that these ＂bonds＂\nwe forge can lead us to a better future.\nYou were the one who taught me that.
So there is meaning in this fribble after\nall. I suppose there's no harm in trying\nnew things.
Leonidas! Does that mean you're back in\nthe band?
Indeed. But know that I find half-measures\nto be anathema. I do hope you're prepared.
Y'know, I almost thought we weren't gonna\nmake it! Thank goodness Leonidas decided\nto come back to us.

He pulled the whole group back together
like, uh...like some kind of mega hair tie!
They're sooo much better than they were
yesterday. I barely even recognize them!
You can say that again. I think we\nhave a fighting chance now.
Speaking of bringing people together!\nWhy don't we figure out who's gonna be\nthe leader of you little stud muffins?
Given his credentials, I'd say Leonidas\nis probably the best man for the job.
Because there is someone far more suited\nfor the role than I.
It has to be you, Brother.\nDoes anyone object to that?
I think he'd be a great fit!
Sweet! Then that settles it.\n{player_name}'s gonna be our\nmain man!
Well, if you all think that's best...\nI accept. I'll give it all I've got!
Hoo to the ray! Now that that's settled,\nlet's get on with our next lesson.
But we've already done dancing\nand singing. What else is there?
Weeell, if there's one thing that pop stars\nare reeeally known for, it's working the \ncrowd!
Listen up, boys, 'cause I'm gonna teach\nyou how to turn those fans into STANS!
(Sounds like we've got our work cut out\nfor us...)
